Personal data for Plone HRM
===========================

This package adds extended personal data for Employees in Plone HRM.
For more info see the Products.plonehrm package.

Note: this package is going to be removed.  It has been integrated in
Products.plonehrm itself.

This is a stripped 2.0 release for use with Products.plonehrm 2.0;
this version is needed for migration only.

Any future 1.0.x releases will be bug fix releases for use with
Products.plonehrm 1.0.
